jump_scares.spoiler: Claire gets a shock from the bathroom power socket
An eye appears suddenly on the other side of the fence hole that Claire is looking through
Claire is startled by the phone ringing
Claire looks into various rooms of her neighbours house with binoculars, in one of the rooms she sees Warren looking at her
Claire turns around and her husband is standing right behind her
The reflection of another woman can be seen in the bathtub water
The door opens during the Seance and the dog Cooper walks in
A reflection moves in the steamed-up bathroom mirror
Norman closes the fridge door and Claire is standing behind it
Claire’s head falls back and she briefly appears as a decomposing corpse, startling Norman. [Video
Norman’s hand appears over the side of the bathtub
Claire stands on something sharp and screams
Norman’s fingers twitch as Claire tries to get the phone
